title: Did California Pass a Law Protecting Pedophiles Who Rape Children?
subtitle: A bill signed into law by Gov. Gavin Newsom leaves the decision whether individuals convicted of particular sex crimes involving minors must register as sex offenders to the discretion of the court.
author: David Emery
vclaim: California Senate Bill 145, signed into law by Gov. Gavin Newsom in September 2020, shields pedophiles who rape children from having to register as sex offenders.
